name: ShinePhone
0:
”Alexa, open shine phone.”
”Alexa, ask shine phone to add a reminder.”
”Alexa, ask shine phone to refresh.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shine phone
des:
This skill can help you get the latest power plants information.To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Shine Phone account.
Your power plants list will be refreshed everytime you say "Alexa, open shine phone", or you can say "Alexa, ask shine phone to refresh" to refresh your plant list.
After refreshing the power plants list, you can say the following: 
"what is the energy of my plant yesterday"
"what is the earnings of my plant this month"
You can set a reminder by saying "Alexa, ask shine phone to add a reminder." This reminder will report the power plants information according to your configuration at our app Shine Phone.

Tip: Please choose an easily recognizable name for your power plant on our Shine Phone app, such as "my plant" in the example phrase. Do not use abbreviations.
If you have any questions, please email growatt2016@163.com to contact us.
